name: Jordan Kim
persona: Jordan Kim is a 20-year-old psychology major with a CGPA of 2.62. While Jordan is motivated to improve academically, they sometimes struggle with self-discipline and maintaining consistent study habits. Jordan experiences moderate confidence in their academic abilities and generally manages test anxiety well. They are determined to persist in their studies, seeking ways to boost their motivation and better regulate their effort. Jordan is open to new strategies to help them reach their academic goals.
